name: Dottie
tagline: Private AI Journal
description: Private AI Journal that helps you reflect. All data is stored on-device for maximum privacy. When using Apple Intelligence as the LLM, personal data never leaves your device. chatGPT, Gemini and Claude are running in the cloud, but will not store data or use it for training.

name: Time Ledger
tagline: Manage your time like you manage your money.
description: Now you can keep a ledger of your time. Designed for simplicity: just tap buttons to record your day without typing. Analyze patterns to discover where your time leaks.

name: Yomio
tagline: Turns expenses into the spending truth your bank wonâ€™t show.
description: Receipts are messy. Insights shouldnâ€™t be. Upload receipts and e-receipts, and Yomio turns them into a clear, searchable history of what you actually bought â€” item by item. Spot recurring costs, hidden habits, and real spending patterns across personal, household, or business expenses. No guessing. Just clarity.

name: Good Assistant
tagline: Partner for goals that matter
description: Good Assistant is a passion project with simple goal. To give us all an assistant that will make real impact on the goals most important to us. With powerful memory, notes, proactivity, reminders / tasks of any kind, focus and persistence in helping you get to where you want to be.

name: Hyta
tagline: The home of the AI training force
description: Hyta powers post-training teams, RL vendors, AI labs, agent builders, and enterprises to run AI post-training reliably at scale by orchestrating always-on pipelines of high-quality specialised human signals across workflows and industries, tracking verified post-training contributions across domains, and compounding frontier capabilities.

name: Reavion
tagline: Autonomous browser agents for outbound and GTM execution
description: Reavion is an AI-powered browser that navigates, reads, decides, and acts for you. Automate outbound and go-to-market tasks, save hours on repetitive workflows, and scale growth without extra hires. Designed for founders, marketers, and teams who want smarter, faster, reliable automation.

name: Compressor
tagline: The fastest video compressor for Android.
description: Compressor is the fastest video compressor for Android. Period. Full stop. End of discussion. Compared to the top Play Store result for video compressor, Compressor is 117x faster (11 seconds vs 21 minutes). It's completely native, ad-free, no paywalls, no subscriptions, just an awesome free app, written completely in Kotlin and using native Media3 transformer pipelines for compression. It's got everything you'd want from a video compressor, presets, target size, etc, without any extra bloat.

name: Projects Yard
tagline: Display Projects, Portfolios & get Discovered by Recruiters
description: ProjectsYard lets you create discoverable portfolios in 15 mins. Candidates present real project work in a searchable, recruiter-facing directory organized by skills, not keywords. They turn resumes and decks into structured STAR showcases using AI in seconds. Recruiters run search for candidates based on skills backed by real projects and real impact instead of shallow resume pointers. ProjectsYard replaces scattered portfolios with a discoverable skills-first talent layer.

name: â–ž nichesim v.1
tagline: Simulate communities and gather feedback through AI personas
description: â–ž nichesim lets you test and validate your ideas against thousands of AI personas. Simulate how real communities would react to your product, content, or campaignâ€”before going public. De-risk building with synthetic user feedback.

name: Invoicey.io
tagline: Free AI invoice & quote generator with 1-click conversion
description: Invoicey is a free AI-powered invoice and quote generator. Create quotes, let AI handle VAT and details, and convert them into invoices in one click. Built for freelancers and small businesses, with EU compliance and GDPR-friendly hosting. No paywalls. No limits. Just simple invoicing.

name: Prompty Town
tagline: Yet another link directory - but better
description: Yet another link directory - but better

name: ForgeUI Pro
tagline: Components that make your React app feel expensive
description: ForgeUI Pro is a premium collection of animated React + Tailwind components built for SaaS products. No generic hero sections. No bloated UI kits. You get bento grids, interactive dashboards, data-driven visuals, and micro-interactions powered by Framer Motion & GSAP. Drop-in components, clean code, production-ready, and designed to boost perceived quality and conversions.

name: WORKFREAK
tagline: Turn what you watch into what you do
description: AI Mentor connects your trusted content from YouTube, PDFs, websites and other sources with your daily data to give you the personalized guidance to achieve your goal

name: superscribe.io
tagline: Speak. Track. Bill.
description: The missing link between voice-to-text and time tracking. Dictate in any language, text streams live, projects auto-detected. Your voice becomes your timesheet. macOS menu bar.

name: NOTtodolist
tagline: Anti-productivity app that refuses to work at night
description: Most productivity apps want you to do more. NOTtodolist helps you do less. It is a sanctuary for subtraction designed for the burnout generation. âœ¨ **Haptic Release:** Don't just delete tasks. Physically hold to "release" burdens, turning stress into stardust. ðŸŒ™ **Night Lock:** The app refuses to work at night. It locks the interface to force you to disconnect and sleep. ðŸ”’ **100% Private:** No accounts. No cloud. Local-first architecture. Stop doing. Start being.

name: Agent Settlement Extension (ASE)
tagline: ASE is an economic metadata layer that extends A2A and MCP
description: Agent Settlement Extension (ASE) is an economic metadata layer that extends existing A2A and MCP agent communication protocols with financial semantics. It adds standardized structures for cost attribution, delegation, and settlement events, enabling agents to exchange not just tasks, but economic intent. ASE is part of the Caracal project, building the foundation for governed, auditable agent economies.

name: Reddar
tagline: Target high-intent Reddit posts for your product
description: Reddar turns Reddit into a growth channel. Using AI to detect buying intent, surface your brand in competitor SERPs, earn AI search mentions and engage 24/7.

name: TaskAI
tagline: Organize your life, your way | AI-Powered Task Management
description: The most flexible task manager. Chat naturally with AI or use a refined visual interface. Switch seamlessly between modes - your tasks stay perfectly in sync.

name: Sidemail Validator
tagline: Free email address validator (inc. SMTP deep check)
description: Free, fast, no-login email validity checker. Paste an email address, and weâ€™ll check syntax, domain & MX records, flag disposable providers and typos, and optionally run a safe SMTP deep check without sending email. You can copy the results and validate more addresses in seconds.

name: BrowserConvert
tagline: 100% Private local file converter. No uploads, no signups.
description: Convert images, video, and audio entirely on your device. Powered by WebAssembly, your files never leave your browser. Don't spend time on upload/download.
